Package br.com.kirgh.app.utils

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
br.com.kirgh.app.utils.Utils
public abstract class Utils extends Object
The Utils class is an abstract class that provides utility methods.

  • Method Details

    • convertBytesToUUID

      public static UUID convertBytesToUUID(byte[] bytes)
      The function converts a byte array to a UUID object in Java.
      Parameters:
      bytes - The bytes parameter is an array of bytes that represents a UUID.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) object.

    • removePageableKeysFromFilter

      public static void removePageableKeysFromFilter(Map<String,String> filter)
      The function removes the keys page, size, and sort from a given map.
      Parameters:
      filter - A map containing key-value pairs.

    • validateFilters

      public static void validateFilters(Map<String,String> filters, Class entityClass)
      The function validates if the fields in the given filters map are valid for the given entity class.
      Parameters:
      filters - A map containing the filters to be validated. The keys represent the field names and the values represent the filter values.
      entityClass - The entityClass parameter is the class of the entity for which the filters are being validated. It is used to determine the allowed fields for the filters.

    • buildSpecification

      public static org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification buildSpecification(Map<String,String> filters)
      The function builds a specification for filtering data based on a map of filters, where each filter is applied as a predicate to the root entity.
      Parameters:
      filters - A map containing the filters to be applied to the query. The keys represent the field names in the entity, and the values represent the filter values to be matched.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a Specification object.
